SELECT a.id, a.disk_id AS "diskId", a.share_user_id as "shareUserId", (select name from sys_account where id=a.share_user_id) as "shareUserName", b.name, b.type, b.path, b.capacity, b.company_id as "companyId", b.parent_id as "parentId", b.link, b.text, b.capacity, b.status,
DATE_FORMAT(a.share_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "shareTime"
to_char(a.share_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "shareTime"
to_char(a.share_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "shareTime"
to_char(a.share_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') AS "shareTime"
to_char(a.share_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS "shareTime"
CONVERT(varchar, a.share_time, 120 ) AS "share_time"
FROM jelly_disk_share a JOIN jelly_disk b ON a.disk_id = b.id
a.company_id = #{companyId} AND a.user_id = #{userId} AND b.status = 1 order by a.share_time desc
